title: Amadeus : distribution market share 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Market share has rose over the Year.
Market share is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, and finally slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Market share, about 43.9 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Market share about 38.6 was reached at Year 2012
